ANU.name: Alan Martina
expertise: Legal Institutions Incl. Courts And Justice Systems
interest: Central interest is that of devising a general model of long-term process of economic development and, above all, the testing of this model with the application of pertinent historical information in the testing of a wide range of hypotheses.
